description: Topic for 2012-13: Parallel and Distributed computing, including multicore cluster programming, and map-reduce data-intensive scalable computing. Prerequisite: Computer Science 251, or permission of instructor. Offered alternate years.

prerequisites: Computer Science 251, or permission of instructor. Offered alternate years.
